name: @stein197/react-ui
description: Set of common UI components for React

scripts.demo: microbundle --tsconfig tsconfig.dev.json -i demo/index.tsx -o demo/index.js -f iife --no-generateTypes --no-pkg-main --define process.env.NODE_ENV=development --external=none
scripts.demo:watch: microbundle --tsconfig tsconfig.dev.json -i demo/index.tsx -o demo/index.js -f iife --no-generateTypes --no-pkg-main --define process.env.NODE_ENV=development --external=none -w

author: Nail' Gafarov
